mapper.sql: print_label_id, package_id, produce_date, produce_batch, num, `type`, origin, material_no, location_no, relate_label_id, relate_package_id, create_time, dr
mapper.select:
select
from si_print_label where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and dr = 1
mapper.insert: insert into si_print_label (print_label_id, package_id, produce_date, produce_batch, num, `type`, origin, material_no, location_no, relate_label_id, relate_package_id, create_time, dr) values (#{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update si_print_label
package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
location_no = #{locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_print_label set package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, produce_batch = #{produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, location_no = #{locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, relate_label_id = #{relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relate_package_id = #{relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select pl.print_label_id, pl.package_id, pl.produce_date, pl.produce_batch, pl.num, pl.`type`, pl.origin, pl.material_no, pl.location_no, pl.relate_label_id, pl.relate_package_id, pl.create_time, pl.dr from si_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_label rl on pl.print_label_id = rl.print_label_id where rl.receipt_body_id = #{receiptBodyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.dr = 1 order by pl.create_time desc

select
from si_print_label where package_id like #{no,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' order by print_label_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into si_print_label (print_label_id, package_id, produce_date, produce_batch, num, `type`, origin, material_no, location_no, relate_label_id, relate_package_id, create_time, dr) values
(#{po.printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.produceDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.produceBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{po.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.origin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{po.materialNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.locationNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.relateLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.relatePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select pl.print_label_id as printLabelId, pl.package_id as packageId, pl.produce_batch as produceBatch, pl.produce_date as produceDate, pl.num, pl.create_time as createTime, m.material_no as materialNo, m.material_desc as materialDesc from si_print_label pl left join sm_receipt_label rl on pl.print_label_id = rl.print_label_id left join si_material m on pl.material_no = m.material_no where rl.receipt_body_id = #{rbid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pl.package_id = #{pid,jdbcType=CHAR} and pl.dr = 1 and rl.storage_id is null
